title: Nice Simple Rounded Typeface With a Bit of Whimsy
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/metrie_4031.jpg)

Would like help identifying this font. Thoughts?
author: tbufano

comments.content: Thought I almost found it, but the "R" and "I" wasn't as curvy...the hunt continues...
Unfortunately, I haven't found a match for this one but it's actually pretty close to [Banda](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003954/http:/www.typedepot.com/banda)...
